Plot: When a career criminal's plan for revenge is thwarted by unlikely circumstances, he puts his intended victim's son in his place by putting him in prison...and then joining him.
Title: Let's Go to Prison
Writer: Robert Ben Garant, Thomas Lennon, Michael Patrick Jann, Jim Hogshire (book)
Actors: Dax Shepard, Will Arnett, Chi McBride, David Koechner
tomatoConsensus: Let's Go to Prison is guilty on all counts of cliched setups, base humor, and failure to ellicit laughs.
